promptPrefix: Create google bussines site posts [TARGETLANGUAGE] for to promote [PROMPMT] sales and SEO positioning of a outdoor astronomical tourism company. It also focuses on the dissemination of science, astronomy and ancestral sciences, designing routes with high educational and cultural value in the Elqui Valley.
title: Create  Post for Sales and Seo
